price: Enti awoͻ ntoatoasoͻ dodoͻ a Yɛadi wͻn anim kan asεe wͻn a wͻnenam faako a na wͻteteε no, εnyε kwankyerε (anaasε adesua) mma wͻn? Nokorε sε nsεnkyerεnee wͻ woi mu dema mmadwenmmafoᴐ no.
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni yamshūna fī masākinihim inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
